akn:content.akn:p: §§ 615v to 615x. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section 615v, Pub. L. 86–745, § 1, Sept. 13, 1960, 74 Stat. 882, authorized construction, operation, and maintenance of Dallas Project, Oregon. Section 615w, Pub. L. 86–745, § 2, Sept. 13, 1960, 74 Stat. 882, related to provisions concerning construction, operation, and maintenance of this project and to rates for power and energy. Section 615x, Pub. L. 86–745, § 3, Sept. 13, 1960, 74 Stat. 883, authorized appropriations for this project.
